snippet.title: Battlestar Galactica Deadlock: Season One Finale Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy Sin and Sacrifice on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1001150/Battlestar_Galactica_Deadlock_Sin_and_Sacrifice/

The new DLC Sin and Sacrifice marks the end of Season 1 in #BattlestarGalacticaDeadlock. 

#SinandSacrifice is out today! 

New Campaign

A brand-new story campaign with 11 story missions set after the original Deadlock campaign and Operation Anabasis.
 

New Radio Chatter

Colonial Fleet radio chatter voice pack. A new radio chatter system featuring over 1100 unique recordings injects more drama and tension into the combats of Battlestar Galactica Deadlock, bringing your knife-edge encounters to life. 

 
New Ships


Colonial Heracles - Heavy Gunship
An Imperial Wars era gunship of Leonid descent. 


Cylon Gorgon – Squadron Support
A mobile support carrier with advanced squadron repair and support functions. 



Join our official BSG Discord: https://discord.gg/nMAdZJc

Follow us on: 

Facebook BSGD: https://www.facebook.com/bsgdeadlock/
Slitherine Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/slitherine/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SlitherineGames
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/slitherinegroup

#BattlestarGalactica

Video credits: Arseniy Korablev
Teya Conceptor (ex-polybrush) creator, 3d artist & animator, c++ programmer
https://www.artstation.com/arsdraw
